entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
